item.title: Reactjs.tw Meetup #14 | 都 2022 年了你可能還是不懂 useEffect | Zet
JavaScript V8 Engine
item.description: V8 is Google’s open source high-performance JavaScript and WebAssembly engine, written in C++. It is used in Chrome and in Node.js, among others. It implements ECMAScript and WebAssembly, and runs on Windows 7 or later, macOS 10.
